hizbs.text: wamin'hum man ʿahada l-laha la-in atana min fadlihi lanassaddaqanna walanakunanna mina l-salihina
falamma atahum min fadlihi bakhilu bihi watawallaw wahum muʿ'riduna
fa-aʿqabahum nifaqan fi qulubihim ila yawmi yalqawnahu bima akhlafu l-laha ma waʿaduhu wabima kanu yakdhibuna
alam yaʿlamu anna l-laha yaʿlamu sirrahum wanajwahum wa-anna l-laha ʿallamu l-ghuyubi
alladhina yalmizuna l-mutawiʿina mina l-mu'minina fi l-sadaqati wa-alladhina la yajiduna illa juh'dahum fayaskharuna min'hum sakhira l-lahu min'hum walahum ʿadhabun alimun
is'taghfir lahum aw la tastaghfir lahum in tastaghfir lahum sabʿina marratan falan yaghfira l-lahu lahum dhalika bi-annahum kafaru bil-lahi warasulihi wal-lahu la yahdi l-qawma l-fasiqina

fariha l-mukhalafuna bimaqʿadihim khilafa rasuli l-lahi wakarihu an yujahidu bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim fi sabili l-lahi waqalu la tanfiru fi l-hari qul naru jahannama ashaddu harran law kanu yafqahuna
falyadhaku qalilan walyabku kathiran jazaan bima kanu yaksibuna

fa-in rajaʿaka l-lahu ila taifatin min'hum fa-is'tadhanuka lil'khuruji faqul lan takhruju maʿiya abadan walan tuqatilu maʿiya ʿaduwwan innakum raditum bil-quʿudi awwala marratin fa-uq'ʿudu maʿa l-khalifina
wala tusalli ʿala ahadin min'hum mata abadan wala taqum ʿala qabrihi innahum kafaru bil-lahi warasulihi wamatu wahum fasiquna
wala tuʿ'jib'ka amwaluhum wa-awladuhum innama yuridu l-lahu an yuʿadhibahum biha fi l-dun'ya watazhaqa anfusuhum wahum kafiruna
wa-idha unzilat suratun an aminu bil-lahi wajahidu maʿa rasulihi is'tadhanaka ulu l-tawli min'hum waqalu dharna nakun maʿa l-qaʿidina
radu bi-an yakunu maʿa l-khawalifi watubiʿa ʿala qulubihim fahum la yafqahuna
lakini l-rasulu wa-alladhina amanu maʿahu jahadu bi-amwalihim wa-anfusihim wa-ulaika lahumu l-khayratu wa-ulaika humu l-muf'lihuna
aʿadda l-lahu lahum jannatin tajri min tahtiha l-anharu khalidina fiha dhalika l-fawzu l-ʿazimu
wajaa l-muʿadhiruna mina l-aʿrabi liyu'dhana lahum waqaʿada alladhina kadhabu l-laha warasulahu sayusibu alladhina kafaru min'hum ʿadhabun alimun
laysa ʿala l-duʿafai wala ʿala l-marda wala ʿala alladhina la yajiduna ma yunfiquna harajun idha nasahu lillahi warasulihi ma ʿala l-muh'sinina min sabilin wal-lahu ghafurun rahimun
wala ʿala alladhina idha ma atawka litahmilahum qul'ta la ajidu ma ahmilukum ʿalayhi tawallaw wa-aʿyunuhum tafidu mina l-damʿi hazanan alla yajidu ma yunfiquna
